long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Among Us is an engaging online game that has gained massive popularity. It is also available as a Chrome extension and can be played for free on the website https://classroom-6x.org/. In this game, players join a spaceship crew and work together to complete tasks and maintain the ship's operations. However, among the crew members, there are impostors whose mission is to eliminate the crew and take control of the ship. The crew members must be vigilant and identify the impostors through discussion and voting. The game combines elements of strategy, deduction, and social interaction as players try to uncover the impostors while keeping the ship running smoothly. Can you survive as a crew member or deceive others as an impostor? Play "Among Us" to find out!

*Note: We have added "Classroom 6x, Poki Unblocked" button, making it easy for players to quickly access the games on our website! https://classroom-6x.org/, https://poki.ee/
